title: How to Get Ditto in Pokémon Emerald

steps.title: Defeat the Elite 4 with some powerful Pokémon.
steps.content: Defeat the Elite 4 with some powerful Pokémon.

steps.title: Go to the Fossil Maniac's house in Fallarbor town, near Meteor Falls.
steps.content: Go to the Fossil Maniac's house in Fallarbor town, near Meteor Falls. You can get there through Rustboro City if you want.

steps.title: Go into the Desert Underpass.
steps.content: Go into the Desert Underpass. The Pokémon there you can find are: Ditto 50% Lvl. 38-45 Whismur 34% Lvl. 35-38 Loudred 16% Lvl. 38-44

steps.title: Catch Ditto and proceed to the end of the cave and get the other Fossil you didn't get from the Tower in the Desert near Lavaridge.
steps.content: Catch Ditto and proceed to the end of the cave and get the other Fossil you didn't get from the Tower in the Desert near Lavaridge.
